title: (x) Machine Gun Naked In The Street sans caps - Akzidenz Grotesk {Yves}
content:
anybody know this typeface?  
the face does not have rounded corners. it only appears that way because of the low quality image.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202182703im_/http:/typophile.com/files/AL_4619.jpg)
author: renderjones
